comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Priest and Victim, Jesus dies, gives Himself in sacrifice. Christ, the sinless Son of God, offers up for us His blood, gives Himself in sacrifice, Priest and Victim, Jesus dies!

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Lord of life, behold Him stand now for us at God's right hand. Still our human frame He wears, feels our woes and heeds our prayers; now for us at God's right hand, Lord of life, behold Him stand!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Prince and Savior, Christ shall come, soon to take His ransomed home; His the kingdom, His the pow'r, His the glory in that hour, soon to take His ransomed home, Prince and Savior, Christ shall come!

verse.name: v5
